com.bartish.twentyfortyeight.actors

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
        • com.bartish.twentyfortyeight.actors.GameBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable

    public class GameBoard
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
    Contain Blocks. Can move, add or random add this or new Blocks.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    pixel-pixel

        Config GameBoard`s objects on start and restart.

      • act

        public void act(float delta)
        Put board and all Blocks in right position by matrix.
        Overrides:
        act in class com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
        Parameters:
        delta - Not use.

      • unconnected

        private void unconnected()
        Need for right work with moving Blocks. Do not use!

      • isAnimationEnded

        public boolean isAnimationEnded()
        Check if animation of all Blocks in matrix is finished. Check it up(), down(), left(), right() before methods!
        Returns:
        Is animation ended.

      • up

        public void up()
        Move or marge all Blocks to up. If can it - add new random Block.
        See Also:
        move(int, int, int, int), addRandomBlock()

      • down

        public void down()
        Move or marge all Blocks to down. If can it - add new random Block.
        See Also:
        move(int, int, int, int), addRandomBlock()

      • left

        public void left()
        Move or marge all Blocks to left. If can it - add new random Block.
        See Also:
        move(int, int, int, int), addRandomBlock()

      • right

        public void right()
        Move or marge all Blocks to right. If can it - add new random Block.
        See Also:
        move(int, int, int, int), addRandomBlock()

      • addRandomBlock

        public void addRandomBlock()
        Randomly selects a free position in matrix and adds where a block with Num 0 or 1. Num is position in Tones array. Real number will be 2 or 4
        See Also:
        addBlock(int, int, int), Tones.get(int)

      • addBlock

        public void addBlock(int x,
                     int y,
                     int num)
        Add new Block to matrix if position == null else throw AddBlockException
        Parameters:
        x - X position of new Block in matrix
        y - Y position of new Block in matrix
        num - Num of new Block in matrix
        See Also:
        AddBlockException

      • canMove

        public void canMove(int oldX,
                    int oldY,
                    int newX,
                    int newY)
             throws MoveBlockException
        Check if can move Block from old position to new in matrix or throw MoveBlockException.
        Parameters:
        oldX - X position of Block
        oldY - Y position of Block
        newX - New X position of Block
        newY - New Y position of Block
        Throws:
        MoveBlockException - If block cant be moved to new position.

      • move

        public void move(int oldX,
                 int oldY,
                 int newX,
                 int newY)
        Move and animate Block from old position to new in matrix.
        Parameters:
        oldX - X position of Block
        oldY - Y position of Block
        newX - New X position of Block
        newY - New Y position of Block

      • getMatrix

        public int[][] getMatrix()
        Create new int[][] which contains Num of Block in matrix by position. Need to save the game.
        Returns:
        Int matrix which contains Block`s Num or -1.
        See Also:
        Block.getNum()

      • setMatrix

        public void setMatrix(int[][] arr)
        Clean the matrix and add Blocks by its number in array. Need for load the game.
        Parameters:
        arr - Int matrix which contains Block`s Num or -1.
        See Also:
        Block.getNum()

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Check if you can move or add some Block to this GameBoard
        Returns:
        Is GameBoard full and Blocks cant move.

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        Getter for score
        Returns:
        Score of the game in this GameBoard
